Greg Hemmes

Louisville, KY

I am a self-motivated highly reliable recent graduate with a Bachelor of Science degree from the University at Albany. I am goal-oriented and excel at my ability to learn new skills and apply them to the tasks at hand. I recently relocated to Louisville, KY this past summer and have been working remotely as a network specialist at Integrated Technology Group. I am eager to advance my professional career and apply my knowledge to have a positive and lasting impact on your company.
